description:
spec: shorten heading for complex, real, imag

In the current TOC it sticks out quite a bit.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM On Wed, Feb 29, 2012 at 11:58 AM, wrote: > Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com, > > Message: > Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://go.googlecode.com/hg/ > > > Description: > spec: shorten heading for complex, real, imag > > In the current TOC it sticks out quite a bit. > > Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5705053/ > > Affected files: >  M doc/go_spec.html > > > Index: doc/go_spec.html > =================================================================== > --- a/doc/go_spec.html > +++ b/doc/go_spec.html > @@ -4894,7 +4894,7 @@ >  

> > > -

Assembling and disassembling complex numbers

> +

Manipulating complex numbers

> >  

>  Three functions assemble and disassemble complex numbers. > >

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9a4d3bff8bb0 ***
